title: Resistance of wire loops made of same material

content.description: Two concentric circular loops of radii b and 2b, made of the same type of wire, lie in the plane of the page, as shown above.
content.question: The total resistance of the wire loop of radius b is R. What is the resistance of the wire loop of radius 2b ?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
